revised_title: Fossil Mammals of Australia: Genus Phascolomys, Geoff
tldr: This article discusses the fossil mammals of Australia, specifically the genus Phascolomys, with a focus on the species Phascolomys Mitchelli and Phascolomys Krefftii. The author uses cranial and mandibular characters to determine the species and describes the differences between extinct and existing species of wombats. The article is accompanied by illustrations of the fossils.
